info.name: Pankhuri Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for Pankhuri Backend - Auth, Categories, Courses, and Videos

request.description: Authenticate using Google OAuth token
Authenticate using Firebase phone authentication
Authenticate admin using Google OAuth token
Get current authenticated user's profile (requires authentication)
Update current user's profile (requires authentication)
Get all active trainers (public endpoint)
Get trainer details by ID (public endpoint)

query.description: Search by name, email, or phone

request.description: Get all users with filters (Admin only)
Get user details by ID (Admin only)
Create a new user (Admin only)
Update user details (Admin only)
Delete user (Admin only). Users with courses will be suspended instead.
Update user status: active | inactive | suspended (Admin only)
Update user role: user | admin | moderator (Admin only)
Get all trainers with filters (Admin only)
Get trainer details by ID (Admin only)
Create trainer profile for a user (Admin only)
Update trainer profile (Admin only)
Delete trainer profile (Admin only). Cannot delete if trainer has associated courses.
Get hierarchical category tree structure
Get flat list of categories with pagination

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Yoga Basics",
    "slug": "yoga-basics",
    "description": "Introduction to yoga and basic poses",
    "icon": "ðŸ§˜",
    "status": "active",
    "sequence": 1,
    "parentId": null
}

request.description: Create a new category (Admin only)
Update category (Admin only)
Delete category (Admin only)
Update category display sequence (Admin only)
Toggle category status: active | inactive (Admin only)
Get all courses with filters and pagination
Get trending courses based on rating

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Yoga for Beginners",
    "slug": "yoga-for-beginners",
    "description": "Complete beginner's guide to yoga with step-by-step instructions",
    "categoryId": "{{categoryId}}",
    "trainerId": "{{userId}}",
    "thumbnailImage": "https://example.com/thumbnail.jpg",
    "coverImage": "https://example.com/cover.jpg",
    "level": "beginner",
    "duration": 600,
    "language": "en",
    "status": "active",
    "hasCertificate": false,
    "tags": ["yoga", "beginner", "wellness"],
    "metadata": {
        "instructor": "John Doe",
        "difficulty": "Easy"
    }
}

request.description: Create a new course (Admin only)
Update course (Admin only)
Delete course (Admin only)
Publish or unpublish course (Admin only)
Get all modules for a course with lessons
Get module by ID with lessons and navigation
Get module by slug within a course
Create a new module (Admin/Trainer)
Update module (Admin/Trainer)
Delete module (Admin/Trainer). Cannot delete if module has lessons.
Update multiple module sequences at once
Update module status (draft/published/archived). Set updateLessons=true to also update all lessons in the module.
Recalculate and update module duration from its lessons

query.description: Filter by module (leave empty for direct lessons or null for moduleId = null)

request.description: Get all lessons for a course with optional filters
Get free/preview lessons for a course (public endpoint)
Get all lessons in a specific module
Get lesson by ID with navigation (next/previous)
Get lesson by slug within a course

body.raw:
{
    "courseId": "{{courseId}}",
    "moduleId": "{{moduleId}}",
    "videoId": "{{videoId}}",
    "title": "Welcome to Yoga",
    "slug": "welcome-to-yoga",
    "description": "An introductory video about yoga philosophy and benefits",
    "sequence": 1,
    "duration": 15,
    "isFree": true,
    "isMandatory": true,
    "metadata": {
        "difficulty": "beginner"
    }
}

request.description: Create a video lesson. Lesson type is auto-detected: provide videoId for video lesson, or textContent for text lesson. Leave moduleId null/empty for direct course lessons.

body.raw:
{
    "courseId": "{{courseId}}",
    "moduleId": null,
    "textContent": "# Yoga Philosophy\n\nYoga is an ancient practice that combines physical postures, breathing exercises, and meditation...\n\n## The Eight Limbs of Yoga\n\n1. Yama (moral disciplines)\n2. Niyama (positive duties)\n3. Asana (postures)...",
    "title": "Understanding Yoga Philosophy",
    "slug": "understanding-yoga-philosophy",
    "description": "A comprehensive guide to yoga philosophy",
    "sequence": 2,
    "estimatedReadTime": 10,
    "isFree": false,
    "isMandatory": true
}

request.description: Create a text lesson. Provide textContent instead of videoId. The system auto-detects it as a text lesson.
Update lesson (Admin/Trainer)
Delete lesson (Admin/Trainer)
Update multiple lesson sequences at once
Update lesson status. Valid values: draft, published, archived
Get all active sessions for current user
Get all sessions (including expired) for current user
Logout from current session
Logout from a specific session
Logout from all sessions
Cleanup expired sessions (Admin only)
Get all modules for a course with lessons
Get module by ID with lessons and navigation
Get module by slug within a course
Create a new module (Admin/Trainer)
Update module (Admin/Trainer)
Delete module (Admin/Trainer). Cannot delete if module has lessons.
Update multiple module sequences at once
Update module status (draft/published/archived). Set updateLessons=true to also update all lessons in the module.
Recalculate and update module duration from its lessons

query.description: Filter by module (leave empty for direct lessons or null for moduleId = null)

request.description: Get all lessons for a course with optional filters
Get free/preview lessons for a course (public endpoint)
Get all lessons in a specific module
Get lesson by ID with navigation (next/previous)
Get lesson by slug within a course

body.raw:
{
    "courseId": "{{courseId}}",
    "moduleId": "{{moduleId}}",
    "videoId": "{{videoId}}",
    "title": "Welcome to Yoga",
    "slug": "welcome-to-yoga",
    "description": "An introductory video about yoga philosophy and benefits",
    "sequence": 1,
    "duration": 15,
    "isFree": true,
    "isMandatory": true,
    "metadata": {
        "difficulty": "beginner"
    }
}

request.description: Create a video lesson. Lesson type is auto-detected: provide videoId for video lesson, or textContent for text lesson. Leave moduleId null/empty for direct course lessons.

body.raw:
{
    "courseId": "{{courseId}}",
    "moduleId": null,
    "textContent": "# Yoga Philosophy\n\nYoga is an ancient practice that combines physical postures, breathing exercises, and meditation...\n\n## The Eight Limbs of Yoga\n\n1. Yama (moral disciplines)\n2. Niyama (positive duties)\n3. Asana (postures)...",
    "title": "Understanding Yoga Philosophy",
    "slug": "understanding-yoga-philosophy",
    "description": "A comprehensive guide to yoga philosophy",
    "sequence": 2,
    "estimatedReadTime": 10,
    "isFree": false,
    "isMandatory": true
}

request.description: Create a text lesson. Provide textContent instead of videoId. The system auto-detects it as a text lesson.
Update lesson (Admin/Trainer)
Delete lesson (Admin/Trainer)
Update multiple lesson sequences at once
Update lesson status. Valid values: draft, published, archived
Create a new video (Admin only)
Get all videos with optional filters (Admin only)
Get video by ID (Admin only)
Update video details (Admin only)
Update only the video status (Admin only)
Delete a single video (Admin only)
Delete multiple videos at once (Admin only)
Webhook endpoint for video transcoding service to notify completion
